pages.text: $(bgreen)Plantern$() defies science. He just does. Other plants eat light and excrete oxygen; Plantern eats darkness and excretes light.$(br)$(byellow)Sun Cost$() : $(l)75$()$(br)$(bblue)Recharge$() : $(l)Fast$()$(br)$(l)Features$() : It is a $(l)assist$() plant that providers nearby players with $(byellow)Light Effect$() to $(bred)dispel the fog$().
$(bgreen)Plant Food :$() It will provider $(byellow)high level Light Eye$() effect for nearby entities, which can help watch $(bred)invisible zombies$().
